This is a list of libraries in Singapore:

Contents

  • 1 National libraries
    • 1.1 Regional libraries

  • 2 Private libraries
    • 2.1 Academic libraries
    • 2.2 Specialist libraries
  • 3 External links

National libraries[edit]

These libraries are managed by the National Library Board.

  • National Library, Singapore
  • Lee Kong Chian Reference Library
  • National Reference Library (former)
